funeral-grey.jpg.title: Funeral Grey
funeral-grey.jpg.alt: A woman dressed in a thick grey cardigan over a summer dress and fishnets.

cat.jpg.title: In Her Image
cat.jpg.alt: A small black cat in a great forest. The shadow of a giant cat goddess towers over her. She seems unphased.

shadow-person.jpg.title: Looming Shadow
shadow-person.jpg.alt: A dark room. An open door. A looming shadow-person in the light.

graveyard.jpg.title: As Above, So Below
graveyard.jpg.alt: A sprawling tree climbs into the sky. At its roots, tombstones fertilize its life force.

bridge.jpg.title: Bridge
bridge.jpg.alt: You stand under a bridge, looking out onto a path leading somewhere in a dark forest. Streetlamps light your way.
